attributes.action: Have an inquiry into excess mortality rate in England and Wales for 2022
attributes.additional_details: Its the governments responsibility to look after its citizens.
attributes.background: There have been an extra 38,644 deaths up to week 43 2022 compared to same period in 2019. That's an extra 900 deaths a week, 432,420 in 2019, 471,064 in 2022. I would like an inquiry into this as its happening in other parts of the world too.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628188
